Name: Chompworks: Narrow Sinking Platform
Notes:
A narrow blue and green platform that sinks when Mario/Luigi stand on it. Used on the Golden Chomp planet in Chompworks Galaxy.

[MapPart Arguments]
MoveConditionType: Distance - How far it sinks (a negative value to make the object rising up will glitch, turning the object over instead will work)
RotateSpeed: Sinking Speed - How fast it sinks
RotateAngle: Return Speed - How fast it comes back to it's initial height
